scripts.prepare: bash -c '[ ! -d ./layers/base/.nuxt ] && pnpm run --parallel dev:prepare || true' && bash -c '[ ! -f ./shared/localhost/localhost.pem ] && [ -z $DENO_DEPLOY ] && pnpm run workspace:generate-certs || true'
scripts.deploy:deno:project: bash -c 'pnpm run --filter=$DENO_DEPLOY_APP_SLUG build && pnpm run --filter=$DENO_DEPLOY_APP_SLUG deploy:deno $(pwd)' && ls -la ./ && ls -la ./.output
scripts.workspace:generate-certs: bash -c 'command -v mkcert && cd ./shared/localhost && mkcert -install && mkcert -cert-file localhost.pem -key-file localhost-key.pem localhost 127.0.0.1 ::1'
